sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-select 
    :items="items" 
    v-model="value"
    label="Solo field" 
    solo
  >
  </v-select>
</template>


<script>
export default {
  name: 'VehicleTypeControl',

  props: ["getData", "putData", "items"],

  data() {
    return {
      value: ''
    };
  },

  methods: {
    change(e) {
      this.value = e.target.value;
      this.update();
    },
    update() {
      if (this.ikey) this.putData(this.ikey, this.value);
      this.emitter.trigger("process");
    },
  },

  mounted() {
    this.value = this.getData(this.ikey);
  },
};
</script>
